Summary: I was riding in a van then all of a sudden a bight star not to high above beamed through the night, it was really bright
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving in a van with my dad then all of a sudden a really bright star like not to high above maybe like 100 ft. and it beamed through the sky soo fast,nothing we humans have made can go that fast,me and my dad were shocked!I lost sight of the object because it was moving to fast.
